WRITING.TEXT: To put it bluntly, no. Your laptop has a built in GPU ('graphics card'). That slot can be used for external wireless cards, tv tuners etc.

WRITING.TITLE: What is the best AMD HD3D monitor for the money?
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm looking for one that has a display port input as active adapters are quite expensive. Any ideas?
Edit: Want to use eyefinity in the future so the display port saves me the cost of adapters. A monitor with both display port and dvi is ideal.
Have you set the power control settings to -20 in the Catalyst Control Center?

WRITING.TITLE: All this Kony talk made me wonder...

WRITING.TEXT: Someone was obviously living there, that's what you were hearing.
